sources.data_found: Department of Computer Science About Page: 'The Department of Computer Science... offers... to over 2,500 undergraduate and 850 graduate students.'

student_data.notes: Student counts derived from the CS Department 'About' page stating 'over 2,500 undergraduate and 850 graduate students'. The graduate count was split into MS (650) and PhD (200) estimates based on typical department ratios.

other_high_vram_gpus.notes: Legacy Hopper node hop064 (1 node x 4 GPUs)
Legacy Hopper nodes hop056-hop063 (8 nodes x 2 GPUs)

gpu_resources.notes: GPU data derived from Office of Research Computing (ORC) Hardware list specifications. MEMO Cluster (A100s): 34 total (9 nodes x 2, 2 nodes x 4, 1 node x 8). HOPPER Cluster (V100/P100): 88 V100s (6 nodes x 4, 8 nodes x 8) and 6 P100s (3 nodes x 2).

analysis_notes: Ensemble result aggregated from OpenAI and Gemini models. OpenAI yielded no data due to browsing limitations. Gemini provided specific student counts and detailed cluster configurations for GPUs based on ORC hardware lists.
